column5: This space is the at the top of our 2nd-story home. You have a mini-fridge, microwave, a toaster oven, expresso or kurig coffee maker and full fridge in living room. Access to laundry, patio and hot tub. Scenic walking nearby as well as freeway access to Dallas metroplex of shopping, dining & entertainment. We are warm and welcoming hosts!
column8: Private room near Main Street Frisco
